doc.field: New-York Historical Society museum store records
New-York Historical Society museum store records

Includes requests for museum store catalogs; exchanges in regard to N-YHS items to be included in the Museum Shops of the World Catalog; production of circus, theatrical, and Tiffany postcard books (Dover Publications); store consultant Tom Aageson invoices; vendor proposals for various product possibilities (e.g., textiles, notecards, puzzles by Galison Books, address book); arrangements for sale of products, such as posters and catalogues, associated with particular exhibitions (e.g., Arnold Newman, Irving Browning, Government by Choice, Childe Hassam Flag Paintings, Jasper Cropsey, Jackie Robinson, Pageant of Heraldry); Hudson River Book project; and various design proposals for the store itself (e.g., banners, brochures, catalog).
New-York Historical Society museum store records
Series I. Correspondence Files >> Set 1. Cl - Lu
